text: 9|28|He imandarasakala! Niscaya musbaraikasakala aparaitra, gatike e'i bacharara pichata sihamte yate machajidula haraamara nikatararti nahaya; arau yadi tomaloke daraidratara asanka karaa tente allahe iccha karaile te'omra nija anugrahata tomalokaka abharamukta karaiba. Niscaya allaha mahajnani, prajnamaya.
